summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3507 for the improvement of West Marginal Way, from 1st Avenue South to Iowa Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading and paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 43445, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
